name: illusively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not real or not really what it seems to be: The story's characters are like shadows, illusively seen and described. New technologies only offer us illusively perfect lives.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dusky corners of the room seemed full of strange shadows that came and went illusively.Unreal things may be illusively existent, which is not the same as being non-existent.They illusively assume that they are the very first people to experience these emotions.
